name: Playtest (Sam Knight)
description:
Made for Brackey's Game Jam 2022

Playtest is a narrative based game set in a nice forest with a beautiful cabin. Will you sleep? You should sleep. You have to sleep (no seriously you have to).

Controls

Walk: WASD

Jump: Space

Interact: E

Look with mouse

Making of the game

This is actually my first game jam submission ever. I was originally planning on working with a team until the theme was announced, and I had the idea to mix pixelated and none pixelated objects. I had learned how to do this awhile ago with the tutorial here. My inspiration for a lot of the game was pretty directly inspired by games like The Stanley Parable and Doki Doki Literature Club. The sound and music was also done by me, mostly in Ableton and MaxMSP. I never thought that after a year of game development I'd be able to finish something for a game jam, so thank you so much for anyone who takes the time to play it.
